state.text:
Click the little gear icon in the top right corner to 
change the resolution of the VR scene.
This is the render loop. The content for your VR scene will be placed inside this one. Click "Edit" to enter.
If HMD (Oculus Rift) is not available, the scene will be rendered normally.
